createNewUser(String, String, String, String) - Method in class UserLoginRegistration.UserRegistration
This method takes the required params for the creation of a new user and stores then in the auth file The method checks if the auth file is already present (in the case of first time running of the app) a new auth file is created at - src/main/java/Assets/userAuth.txt The details are written to this file to log the new user for future log ins.
